code: var validation=function validation(values){var errors={};if(!values.courseTitle){errors.courseTitle="Course Name is Required.";}if(!values.courseBrief){errors.courseBrief="Brief Introduction is Required.";}if(!values.numOfChapter){errors.numOfChapter="Chapter Count is Required.";}if(!values.user_id){errors.user_id="User Id  is Required.";}return errors;};export default validation;
